snippet: The Obama re-election campaign is now selling an "O'Bama" T-shirt adorned with a proper three-leaf shamrock "due to the overwhelming popularity" of the four-leaf model, which some Irish purists declared culturally incorrect.
abstract: The Obama re-election campaign is now selling an "O'Bama" T-shirt adorned with a proper three-leaf shamrock "due to the overwhelming popularity" of the four-leaf model, which some Irish purists declared culturally incorrect.

headline.main: O'Bama Shirt Gets More in Touch With Irish Roots
headline.print_headline: A Proper Shamrock, by Popular Demand
